nav.signOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?

home.title: Capturing your moments
home.subtitle: Portraits, weddings, and events. Dedicated to excellence and storytelling.
home.noOnlinePayments: No online payments. Payment is handled offline.

about.title: About
about.intro: Aya Eye offers professional photography for portraits, weddings, and events. We work with you to capture the moments that matter.
about.bookingNote: Booking is by request only. After you submit a request, we will review it and confirm or suggest an alternative. Payment is handled offline—no online payments.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Have a question or want to discuss a project? Send a booking request with your details and we'll get back to you.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.errorHint: Check logs/app.log. Ensure Docker and the database are running.

packages.title: Packages
packages.noOnlinePayments: No online payments. Payment is handled offline.
packages.errorHint: Check logs/app.log for details. Make sure Docker (PostgreSQL) is running and you ran: npx prisma db push && npm run db:seed

booking.title: Request a booking
booking.offlineNote: No online payments. Payment is handled offline.
booking.successMessage: Your booking request has been received and is pending review. We'll contact you to confirm or suggest an alternative.

auth.name: Name
auth.dbError: Database is not running. Start Docker, then run: npx prisma db push && npm run db:seed. Check logs/app.log for details.
auth.serverError: Could not connect to the server. Is it running? Check logs/app.log.

admin.blockedDaysDescription: Block full days or specific time ranges so they are not bookable.
admin.capacityOverridesDescription: Override how many confirmed bookings are allowed on a specific day.
admin.teamUnavailabilityDescription: Mark when a team member is unavailable (reduces capacity for that period).

adminPackages.name: Name
adminPackages.durationHint: End date/time for the customer is auto-calculated from start + this duration.
